glsa.title: libwmf: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libwmf allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.

background.p: libwmf is a library for converting WMF files.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libwmf. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known work around at this time.

resolution.p: All libwmf users should upgrade to the latest version:
